backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no defined functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI ZIP-export removal tasks and associated files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme color variables and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with boot fallback loader, metadata, and app mount point.
frontend/public/health.html: Standalone health-check page showing service status, metadata, and guidance.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring theme, Web3 provider, header, dashboard, and app-mounted event dispatch.
frontend/src/components/BalanceView.tsx: Vault balance UI with refresh, live-update toggle, cache clearing, valuation display, and balances table.
frontend/src/components/ContractInfo.tsx: Displays vault contract details including address, owner, network info, and copy/BscScan link actions.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: Handles depositing BNB or tokens into the vault with validation, transaction sending, and history logging.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsBar.t: Shows build and environment info and provides buttons to copy diagnostics and performance data.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches runtime errors and renders a fallback UI with error details and recovery options.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders app footer showing branding, build metadata, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing branding, wallet connect, and a theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/TokenSelectorInp: Token address input supporting dropdown selection from saved tokens or manual entry.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays a user's deposit and withdrawal history with status badges, links, and a clear-history option.
frontend/src/components/VaultBalancesTab: Shows vault token balances, including BNB and ERC‑20 tokens, with optional USD/BNB valuations and error states.
frontend/src/components/WalletBalancesTa: Renders connected wallet balances for BNB and tokens, including valuations and loading/error indicators.
frontend/src/components/WalletBalancesVi: Provides controls for refreshing and toggling live updates, and displays wallet balances with valuation data.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnect.ts: Handles wallet connection flow, network switching, initialization state, and mobile-specific messaging.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectTop: Top-bar component showing wallet status with connect, switch network, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: UI form for withdrawing BNB or BEP20 tokens, handling validation, wallet checks, transaction calls, and history updates.
frontend/src/global.d.ts: Extends window typings to include Ethereum provider fields for MetaMask-style wallets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
Fetches BNB and token prices to compute USD and BNB valuations for balances, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing, indicating Web3 is used instead of backend queries.
Manages a persistent localStorage-backed token catalog with labels, normalization, and dropdown helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenMetadataCache: Caches token metadata in localStorage with versioning and provides get/set/clear utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useTxHistory.ts: Manages local transaction history, persists it to localStorage, and polls the BSC network to update pending transaction statuses.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultBalances.ts: Fetches and polls BNB and token balances held by the vault with caching, fallbacks, and coalesced RPC calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultInfo.ts: Loads the vault owner's address via a contract call and exposes loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultOperations.ts: Provides deposit and withdrawal functions for BNB and tokens, handling approvals and transaction sending.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletBalances.ts: Fetches and polls the user’s wallet BNB and ERC‑20 balances with caching, timeout handling, and network checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useWatchedTokens.ts: Manages a persistent, validated list of watched token addresses stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3.tsx: Provides Web3 context with wallet connection, chain switching, contract calls, transaction sending, and basic device detection.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus base element styling.
frontend/src/lib/appBranding.ts: Provides app branding constants and helpers for retrieving app name and identifier.
frontend/src/lib/buildExport.ts: Empty placeholder file for future build export utilities.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Defines build version metadata and functions to retrieve build identifiers, including from the DOM.
frontend/src/lib/contracts.ts: Implements contract interaction helpers including method encoding/decoding and stores known function signatures.
frontend/src/lib/evm.ts: Offers low-level EVM utilities for encoding/decoding uint256 and addresses, plus unit parsing/formatting.
frontend/src/lib/evmAbiText.ts: Provides ABI text-decoding helpers for ERC‑20 metadata such as name and symbol.
frontend/src/lib/performanceCheck.ts: Generates performance diagnostics including build info and browser timing data, with a formatter for export.
frontend/src/lib/prices.ts: Fetches token and BNB prices from CoinGecko and formats price values; includes known token ID mappings.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a class name merging helper using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/zipWriter.ts: Empty placeholder file for future ZIP writing utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page that manages wallet connection state, shows balances, and provides deposit/withdraw tabs for vault operations on BSC.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, existing features, and a pending request to remove ZIP output from the build.
